abstract: Jury finds former Portsmouth, Va, Police Officer Stephen Rankin guilty of voluntary manslaughter in 2015 shooting death of William Chapman, and recommends he serve two-and-a-half years in prison.

headline.main: Former Virginia Police Officer Convicted in Killing of Black Teenager

keywords.value: Rankin, Stephen D (Portsmouth, Va, Police Officer)
keywords.name: persons

snippet: A white ex-officer was convicted of manslaughter with the jury recommending he serve two-and-a-half years in prison for killing an unarmed black man....
lead_paragraph: A white ex-officer was convicted of manslaughter with the jury recommending he serve two-and-a-half years in prison for killing an unarmed black man.
